title: CLIENT WONT GIVE ME AN OPTION TO UPGRADE TO NEW CLIENT HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I CANT FIND ANYWHERE HOW TO UPDATE TO NEW CLIENT, RIOT SAY THE CLIENT WILL PROMPT ME WHEN I LOG IN BUT IT NEVER DOES

replies.body:
If you aren't receiving prompts after launching, you should have a button in your Legacy Patcher to perform the upgrade:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

If you have any further issues with upgrading, let me know.

after i i updated i get a message every time after  i click launch "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please Re-install League Alpha Client to try again."

i have re-installed 4 times already no fix.

Ah, this error is quite annoying! You should be able to resolve it by first disabling any Firewalls or Antivirus programs you have active. Once you've done this, hop into your installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file, then launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to attempt the upgrade again.

Once the upgrade completes, you can enable your Firewall/Antivirus programs again. Let me know if this fixed it!
